#summary SciPy Installation Guide
#labels Phase-Deploy

== Requirements ==
DistNumPy works together with SciPy version 0.7.1. 

== Generic Installation  ==
To install SciPy together with MPICH2 we need to tell the mpicc compiler not to use the C++ header:
{{{
CXX=mpic++ CC="mpicc -DMPICH_SKIP_MPICXX" python setup.py install --prefix /your/dir/
}}}

== Cray XE6 (hopper.nersc.gov) ==
This is not need in hopper. However, you may have to use a clean NumPy installation (v 1.3) when compiling SciPy because the frontend is not allowed to call MPI.
{{{
CXX=CC CC=cc python setup.py install --prefix /your/dir/
}}}
